data.actual_result: It shows a check next to mute/deafen (showing that you should be muted or deafened) but nothing happens on discord
data.expected_result: You should be able to mute, deafen, etc. from the control panel
data.steps_to_repro: - Click the "top secret control panel" on the right of your task bar - Click something such as "Mute" or "Deafen" while in a call - Observe result
